structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: An instrument described in KRS 65.410(4) shall contain a covenant against the cutting of timber, trees and other natural growth, except as may be required for fire prevention, thinning, elimination of diseased growth and similar protective measures, or for the harvest of trees in a manner compatible with scenic purposes.
